description: Flaredream Deployment Configuration. Extended in wrangler property 'x-flaredream' but also possible to declare without wrangler in a default exported config property.

disabled.description: For any 'flaredream deploy' deployment, Flaredreams custom configurations are enabled with sensible defaults. Set this to 'true' to disale all.

durability.description: SOON - durability - configures whether or how your worker is made durable. Defaults to "custom" meaning you can get storage by returning a 'x-durable-worker:name' response header
